name: Gundash (barsk)
description:
[SK Games]

Gundash is a 2-4 player Cowboy platformer where shooting will propel you in the opposite direction. Originally made for custom kangaroo hide controllers w/ 2 x 8way joysticks, it's probably playable with xbox controllers.

SK Games was Louie, Sof, Blake, Meg, Kai and Chris
